New Records: Adolis García set a record for RBI in a postseason series with 15
García's home run streak is tied for fourth-longest in postseason history
Key Match Events: Adolis García homered twice and drove in five runs
Corey Seager hit a long homer in the first inning
Jordan Montgomery pitched 2 1/3 scoreless innings out of the bullpen
Max Scherzer allowed four hits and two runs in 2 2/3 innings
Pre-Game Insights: Bruce Bochy became the first skipper to win a League Championship Series with three different teams
Chris Young and Bruce Bochy have spearheaded a swift turnaround with Texas
Post-Match Reflections: Adolis García expressed pride in the team's journey
Bruce Bochy was grateful for the opportunity to manage the Rangers and praised the team's resilience
Dusty Baker acknowledged the defeat but emphasized the team's achievements over the past four years
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Rangers have gone 8-0 away from home in these playoffs
Texas led the AL West for most of the year
Houston's pitching staff got pounded for 20 runs in the final two games of the team's seventh consecutive ALCS
Others: The Astros won all three games at Texas and returned to Minute Maid Park a win shy of their third straight pennant
No club has repeated as World Series champion since the New York Yankees won three straight from 1998-2000
